SELECT t1.id, t1.service_provider_name FROM diyi_service_provider t1
INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_service_provider t2 ON t1.id = t2.service_provider_id
WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0
AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING' AND t2.enterprise_id = #{param1}
AND t1.service_provider_name LIKE concat('%', #{param2}, '%')

SELECT t4.id, t4.enterprise_name, (SELECT COUNT(t1.id) FROM diyi_maker t1 INNER JOIN diyi_maker_enterprise t2 ON t1.id = t2.maker_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.enterprise_id = t4.id AND t2.relationship_type = 'RELEVANCE') AS maker_num FROM diyi_enterprise_service_provider t3 INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise t4 ON t3.enterprise_id = t4.id WHERE t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING' AND t3.service_provider_id = #{param1}
AND t4.enterprise_name LIKE concat('%', #{param2}, '%')

SELECT t2.id, t2.service_provider_name, t1.cooperate_status, t1.create_time, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_pay_enterprise WHERE id = t3.id) + (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_self_help_invoice_sp WHERE id = t5.id) AS cooperation_num, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(pay_to_platform_amount), 0) FROM diyi_pay_enterprise WHERE id = t3.id) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(charge_money_num), 0) FROM diyi_self_help_invoice_sp WHERE id = t5.id) AS cooperation_money FROM diyi_enterprise_service_provider t1 INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider t2 ON t1.service_provider_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN diyi_pay_enterprise t3 ON t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.enterprise_id = t1.enterprise_id AND t3.service_provider_id = t1.service_provider_id AND t3.pay_state = 'CONFIRMPAY' LEFT JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice t4 ON t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.enterprise_id = t1.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice_sp t5 ON t5.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.id = t5.self_help_invoice_id AND (t5.apply_state = 'SUBMITTED' OR t5.apply_state = 'INVOICED') AND t5.service_provider_id = t1.service_provider_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.enterprise_id = #{param1}
AND t2.service_provider_name LIKE concat('%', #{param2}, '%')

SELECT t2.id, t2.enterprise_name, t1.cooperate_status, t1.create_time, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_pay_enterprise WHERE id = t3.id) + (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_self_help_invoice_sp WHERE id = t5.id) AS cooperation_num, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(pay_to_platform_amount), 0) FROM diyi_pay_enterprise WHERE id = t3.id) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(charge_money_num), 0) FROM diyi_self_help_invoice_sp WHERE id = t5.id) AS cooperation_money FROM diyi_enterprise_service_provider t1 INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise t2 ON t1.enterprise_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN diyi_pay_enterprise t3 ON t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.enterprise_id = t1.enterprise_id AND t3.service_provider_id = t1.service_provider_id AND t3.pay_state = 'CONFIRMPAY' LEFT JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice t4 ON t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.enterprise_id = t1.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice_sp t5 ON t5.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.id = t5.self_help_invoice_id AND (t5.apply_state = 'SUBMITTED' OR t5.apply_state = 'INVOICED') AND t5.service_provider_id = t1.service_provider_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.service_provider_id = #{param1}
AND t2.enterprise_name LIKE concat('%', #{param2}, '%')

SELECT t1.id AS enterprise_id, t1.enterprise_name FROM diyi_enterprise t1
INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_service_provider t2 ON t1.id = t2.enterprise_id
WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0
AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING' AND t2.service_provider_id = #{param1}
AND t1.enterprise_name like concat('%', #{param2}, '%')
